1.title: Portable motor drill for taking oriented samples PMB-2b
1.paragraphTwo: PMB-2b hand-held power drill is designed for taking geological, geophysical, geochemical and other samples, in particular for taking oriented paleomagnetic cores of standard diameter.
1.paragraphThree: To ensure maximum reliability, the design of the motor drill PMB-2b uses direct transmission of torque to the drill bit, and its autonomy is ensured by a 50 cc two-stroke gasoline engine with omnidirectional fuel supply for drilling at any angle.
1.paragraphFour: Motor drill PMB-2b provides a simple and reliable type of fastening of the drill bit with an open shank that allows you to change the drill without the use of additional tools.

1.title: Portable tank with hand pump
1.paragraphTwo: 10 liter water tank with hand pump. Kit includes 3 meter hose with quick couplings. Tank has eyelets for attaching a shoulder strap.

1.title: Threadless diamond tipped drill bit
1.paragraphTwo: The drill bit is made of high-strength, non-magnetic stainless steel. The diamond-coated 12 mm wide cutting edge with diametric cutouts ensures high-quality and smooth drilling
1.paragraphThree: The drill bit is designed for wet drilling. The diameter of the resulting core corresponds to the standard diameter of the paleomagnetic sample and typical orienting devices.
